entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
